trans-unit.source: Defines the abstract methods and events that are required to implement a plug-in document output serializer.
trans-unit.target: Define os métodos abstratos e eventos necessários para implementar um serializador de saída de plug-in de documento.

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir ilustra o uso de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" />.

trans-unit.source: Instances of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> should be created by using the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter%2A> method of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider> object, not the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory.CreateSerializerWriter%2A> method of an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory> object.
trans-unit.target: Instâncias do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> devem ser criadas usando o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter%2A> método de um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider> do objeto, não o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory.CreateSerializerWriter%2A> método de um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> using the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter%2A>
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> usando o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter%2A>

trans-unit.source: method.
trans-unit.target: método.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, cancels an asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, cancela uma operação de gravação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> that writes collated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> elements to the serialization <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, retorna um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> que grava elementos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> agrupados na serialização <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> that writes collated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, retorna um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> que grava elementos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> agrupados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> that writes collated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> elements to the document output serialization <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> que grava elementos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> agrupados na serialização <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> de saída do documento.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator" /> should return a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> that writes to the same serialization <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> as the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> that is used to create it.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator" /> deve retornar um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> que grava a serialização mesmo <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> como o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> que é usado para criá-lo.

trans-unit.source: The default print preferences for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> content.
trans-unit.target: As preferências de impressão padrão para o conteúdo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: The default print preferences for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> content.
trans-unit.target: As preferências de impressão padrão para o conteúdo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> that writes collated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> elements together with the given print tickets.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, retorna um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> que grava elementos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> agrupados junto com os tíquetes de impressão fornecidos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> that writes collated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> elements to the document output serialization <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> que grava elementos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> agrupados na serialização <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> de saída do documento.

trans-unit.source: `documentSequencePT` or `documentPT` can be `null` if there are no preferred print settings.
trans-unit.target: `documentSequencePT` ou `documentPT` pode ser `null` se não houver nenhuma configuração de impressão preferencial.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the given print tickets for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não validar ou modificar as permissões de impressão específica para um determinado <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessário, use o método <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para criar um <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> específico <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> que é válido para uma determinada impressora.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator(System.Printing.PrintTicket,System.Printing.PrintTicket)" /> should return a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> that writes to the same serialization <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> as the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> that creates it.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CreateVisualsCollator(System.Printing.PrintTicket,System.Printing.PrintTicket)" /> deve retornar um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriterCollator" /> que grava a serialização mesmo <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> como o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> que o cria.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, synchronously writes content to the serialization <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, grava de maneira síncrona conteúdo para a serialização <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: The output <xref:System.IO.Stream> of the write operation is normally specified as a parameter to the constructor of the derived class that implements <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>.
trans-unit.target: A saída <xref:System.IO.Stream> da gravação operação normalmente é especificada como um parâmetro para o construtor da classe derivada que implementa <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, occurs when a <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CancelAsync" /> operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, ocorre quando uma operação <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.CancelAsync" /> é executada.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, occurs when a write operation finishes.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, ocorre quando uma operação de gravação é concluída.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, occurs just before a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> is added to a stream by a <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.Write" /> or <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WriteAsync" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, ocorre imediatamente antes que um <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> seja adicionado a um fluxo por um método <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.Write" /> ou <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WriteAsync" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event enables the event handler to substitute a new <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for the one specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.Write%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WriteAsync%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> evento permite que o manipulador de eventos substituir um novo <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> para aquele especificado no <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.Write%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WriteAsync%2A> chamada de método.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> updates its progress.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, ocorre quando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> atualiza seu progresso.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> could update its progress after every page or after every document in a multi-document write operation.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter> foi possível atualizar seu andamento depois de cada página ou depois que a operação de gravação de todos os documentos em um documento de vários.
